translations: n．报酬，酬劳：为工作、劳动或服务所支付的报酬。
· The company offers competitive remunerations and benefits.
这家公司提供有竞争力的报酬和福利。

phrs.translation: 薪酬福利条件；薪酬利益；酬金方案

sentences.sentence: Paying overtime remunerations and performance bonuses and providing benefits relevant to the post;
sentences.translation: 支付加班费、绩效奖金，提供与工作岗位相关的福利待遇；

sentences.sentence: For further details on remunerations, please refer to the tables set out in the "Directors, Supervisors and Senior Management" section.
sentences.translation: 具体薪酬情况请参见本章中董事、监事和高级管理人员有关情况的表格。

sentences.sentence: The amount of remunerations shall be determined according to the remuneration to the workers taking up the same or similar posts of this entity by analogy.
sentences.translation: 劳动报酬的数额，参照本单位相同或者相近岗位劳动者的劳动报酬确定。
